ABOUT US

The "key" to success

Quality

Excellence, guaranteed

Passion

Helping you get the very best out of your instrument.

Craftsmanship

Learned from a master technician in Chicago, IL.

Summerhays Piano knows pianos.

Keep your piano in tune. It was specifically designed to be tuned to the international pitch standard of A-440 cycles per second. Your piano will sound its best and give you and your family the most pleasure when it is tuned at least once a year and kept in proper playing condition.
